detail_desc: Chino shorts in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, dropped shoulders, twisted side seams and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Longer jacket woven in a viscose blend with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Lined.

Kimono in patterned satin with low dropped shoulders and a detachable tie belt.
Fully-fashioned trainers in mesh with rubber details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.

Jumpsuit in airy jersey crêpe with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, side pockets and loose-fitting, tapered legs.

Jumpsuit in airy jersey crêpe with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, side pockets and loose-fitting, tapered legs.

Short dress in jersey crêpe with a collar, decorative opening at the front and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Short dress in jersey crêpe with a collar, decorative opening at the front and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar. Buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar. Buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif, faceted plastic beads and studs on the front, and a raw-edge hem.
Double-breasted, hooded cardigan in a garter-stitched cotton blend containing glittery threads.
Balconette bra in lace with lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Imitation suede trainers with appliqués and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Long-sleeved playsuit in airy, patterned, crinkled chiffon with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and short legs. Frill trim down the sleeves and at the hems. Partly lined.
Dress in airy, patterned chiffon with 3/4-length raglan sleeves with an opening and ties. Smocked seam at the waist and a skirt in a double layer of chiffon. Partly lined in jersey.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.

Short, straight dress in a printed viscose crêpe weave with a round neck, opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves.
Short, straight dress in a printed viscose crêpe weave with a round neck, opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves.
Off-the-shoulder dress in jersey crêpe with a gathered V-neck and short, elasticated sleeves with frill trims. Double layer of fabric at the top, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined skirt.

Short, off-the-shoulder, flared dress in a crêpe weave with broderie anglaise. Elastication and a small flounce at the top, long sleeves with smocking and a flounce at the cuffs, and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft, loose, textured knit with 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No buttons.

Short, one-shoulder dress in an airy, printed weave with flounces at the top and a concealed zip in one side. Elasticated seam and short frill trim at the waist, and flared skirt with a seam at the hem. Jersey lining.
Oversized jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a button at the front and welt front pockets. Lined.
Hooded jumper in fine-knit cotton layered over a jersey hem.
Short, cold shoulder dress in cotton poplin with an elasticated flounce at the top, opening and button at the back of the neck and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Top in an airy, printed viscose weave with a yoke, button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with two flounces.
Straight-style jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs.
Straight-style jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs.

Shirt in a striped viscose weave with a grandad collar, French front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Calf-length dress in an airy weave with a V-neck, narrow crossover shoulder straps and decorative straps at the back. Concealed zip in the side and a seam at the waist with a flared, tiered skirt. Lined.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in washed, slightly stretchy twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.

One-shoulder top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Elastication and flounces at the top, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem.

Top in a patterned viscose weave in a double layer at the top with short flounced sleeves. Open at the front with ties and a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, seam under the bust with decorative gathers, and a wide flounce at the hem.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in airy, patterned plumeti chiffon with 3/4-length sleeves. Elastication and a flounce at the top, cuffs and hem. Partly lined.
Short, wide top in a cotton weave with a print motif, dropped shoulders, short sleeves with ribbed detailing and ribbing around the neckline.
Microfibre leggings with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Set of moisturising lip balms. One with a strawberry flavour, one with a vanilla flavour and one with a watermelon flavour. 3x4 g. Not for children under 3, as the packaging contains small parts.
